reviewText: It didn't meet my expectation. I would have really liked it if the story was told in the orginal timeframe it was written.

WE used it an Adult Sunday School Class at the Village Chapel n Pinehurst NC and it was very well received. We took one of the hymns each week over a 5-week period and followed each DVD with discussion, reflections and singing the hymn. Perhaps someone knows of a similar DVD that gives the history  of the great hymns of the church?

Al Mangum
almangum@embarqmail.com
